DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect functional exercise program associate Low Level Laser Therapy ( LLLT ) pain , functional capacity quality life individual fibromyalgia . Half participant receive functional exercise LLLT , half receive functional exercise placebo LLLT .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Functional Exercise Program Associated With Low Level Laser Therapy Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: female ; age 30 50 year ; ovulatory cycle ; height 1.50m 1.80m , body mass 50 80 kg BMI range 18.5 29.9 kg / m2 ; present clinical diagnosis fibromyalgia , sign rheumatologist accord current criterion American College Rheumatology ; least 6 month without physical exercise ; present musculoskeletal condition prevent perform evaluation propose physical activity , except FM ; diabetes mellitus uncontrolled blood pressure ; present inflammatory rheumatic condition serious cardiovascular / pulmonary disease prevents perform evaluation propose physical activity ; Not psychiatric illness malignant tumor ; pregnant present dengue , zika chikungunya last year ; finally hypersensitive light . attend two consecutive exercise session time reason express intention leave study present health problem prevents continue carry propose exercise
